data.actual_result: The PiP shows in the DM
data.expected_result: The PiP will not show in the DM with the user you're sharing screens with
data.short_description: It is possible to make the PiP show in the DM you have with the user
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a video call with a friend - Share a window with them - Change to a different guild with ctrl-2 - Change the window you're sharing via the PiP - Hit ctrl-1 to get back into the DM
